title: Pessat to cet transfer
content: How exactly does this work? College already has all my documents. Should I finish making my profile today since I'll be attending almost a month thru pessat before shifting? Will they internally update details ?

comments.body: yea after you get a seat through kcet, attend the counselling again through kcet and let them know you want to join into the same class  you were in pessat and they will update it by themselves
Class will probably be different cuz I'll be switching from core cs to aiml probably. Also then I should fill the form today right ? And get it updated later

1st years dont have any different classes for different departments 
all of them are s&h dept
Oh okay. Does shuffling happen after first year for everyone ?
